mapper.select: select id, name, picture, wx_openid, session_key, last_time, mark_id, create_time, update_time from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, picture, wx_openid, session_key, last_time, mark_id, create_time, update_time from user
select id, name, picture, wx_openid, session_key, last_time, mark_id, create_time, update_time from user where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
